page.title: 17Primary School's Summer Term
page.content: This term is the busiest of all.Our talents and skills are used to the full.A varied programme of work continues despite many diversions. SPORT Schools in this area are fortunate in having their own playing fields.Going on the field at lunchtime is one of the pleasures of this term.Though the weather has been wet and cold,a full range of games has been played.These include rounders,shinty,stoolball and nonstop cricket.All day children are to be seen practising running,jumping, throwing and hurdling for school sports day.They also have swimming lessons in their learner pools at the new leisure centre.Schools compete at rounders, swimming and athletics.
